features: 【HIGH QULAITY】: Made of food grade silicone with Non-rust Stainless Steel,BPA Free, sturdy and durable. Unlike the nylon or wooden material easy broken, our utensils set will last long.
【HEAT RESISTANT】: No-metling any more, temperatures up to 600°F, silicone head better protect your nonstick cookware, non-scratch.

【BEST KITCHEN TOOLS】: The stainless steel kitchen utensils holder, heavy enough to stay on the kitchen counter for convenience take off the utensils. The thicker silicone spoon rest service for all utensils. Perfect as a Christmas gift.

【ONE SET FOR ALL NEEDS】: 14PCS professional kitchen utensils set including 1 Spoon Rest, 1 Untensil Holder, 1 Whisk, 1 Basting Brush, 1 Spoon Ladle, 1 Pasta Server, 1 Slooted Spaula, 1 Medium Turner Spautla, 1 Large Turner Spatula, 1 Tongs, 1 Solid Spoon, 1 Slotted Spoon, 1 Scrape Spautla, 1 Skimmer.
【EASY TO CLEAN】: Dishwasher safe, even though hand wash all is easy. Such a complete cooking utensils set is a great gift idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous set of utensils
reviews.reviewText: Love this set. Especially the bright colors. Looks great on a bland white kitchen counter. Happy with purchase and quality of the silicone utensils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good looking set, but........
reviews.reviewText: I really like this silicone set of kitchen tools, but I expected a silicon whisk with this set NOT a metal one. I will not use a metal whisk in my non-stick pans, so that was a waste of my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little set
reviews.reviewText: The colors are great and I love that they’re heat resistant up to 600 degrees. Don’t hesitate on buying this set. You’ll be happy you did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Omg just buy it! I’m shocked. This set is $25 and currently has a 50% off coupon. You can get this set for the price of 1-2 pieces at the homegoods store! It’s shockingly high quality!! I’m honestly shocked. My son just moved into an apartment and I needed to get him some utensils… I sent him with a couple of mine and thought I would just buy him his own full set…. I really wasn’t expecting much, it’s a complete set for $25. I didn’t know what I could possibly even be expecting. It’s really nice!!!!! The metal holder is sturdy not thin and flexible. The pieces all fit nicely in it without being tight or constricted yet it takes up very little room on the counter. The rubber is thick and quality feeling? It’s hard to explain. It feels sturdy. The handles are comfortable to hold and use. it comes with any instrument I could think of! lol.I’m really just shocked. I did not expect it to be this nice. Honestly, it’s much nicer than all of my kitchen tools! It’s actually really nice to have a set that’s all the same style/color versus my mismatched tools!Seriously just buy it. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Equipment was as described. Easy to handle and did what they were designed for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As someone who spends a lot of time in the kitchen, I've always been on the lookout for high-quality cooking utensils that can stand up to the rigors of everyday cooking. The HOTEC Heat Resistant Silicone Kitchen Utensils Set has been a game-changer in my kitchen, and I'm thrilled to share my experience with this fantastic 14-piece set.Quality and Durability (5/5): The first thing that struck me about these utensils was their exceptional quality. Crafted from heat-resistant and food-grade silicone, they are not only durable but also safe for use in high-heat cooking. The silicone is BPA-free and does not release any harmful chemicals, ensuring the safety of my family. I've used them with nonstick cookware without a hitch, as they are designed to be gentle on pots and pans, preventing scratches.Variety of Tools (5/5): This set truly covers all the bases in the kitchen. From a flexible turner and slotted spoon to a pasta server and tongs, it includes every essential kitchen tool you might need. The utensils have ergonomic handles that provide a comfortable grip and control during use. I particularly appreciate the inclusion of a basting brush and a whisk, which come in handy for a wide range of recipes.Heat Resistance (5/5): The heat-resistant silicone material can withstand high temperatures without melting or warping. This feature is especially useful when I'm cooking with hot oils or sauces. I've also used the spatula for scraping the last bit of batter from a hot baking sheet without any issues.Easy to Clean (5/5): These utensils are a breeze to clean, either by hand or in the dishwasher. The nonstick silicone surface ensures that food doesn't stick to them, making cleanup a quick and hassle-free process. They've also proven to be stain-resistant, which is a big plus.Stylish Design (5/5): Beyond their functionality, these utensils have a sleek and modern design. The vibrant colors add a touch of style to my kitchen, and they look great hanging on a utensil rack.Affordable (5/5): Given the quality and variety of utensils included in this set, I find it to be a fantastic value for the price. It's an affordable way to upgrade your kitchen tools without breaking the bank.Overall Impression: The HOTEC Heat Resistant Silicone Kitchen Utensils Set has truly exceeded my expectations. It's a versatile and durable collection of kitchen gadgets that have made my cooking experiences more enjoyable and efficient. Whether you're a seasoned home chef or a beginner in the kitchen, this set is an excellent addition to your culinary arsenal. It has become an essential part of my cooking routine, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.In summary, if you're in the market for a high-quality, heat-resistant, and stylish kitchen utensil set that covers all your cooking needs, look no further than HOTEC. I highly recommend this set to anyone who values both form and function in their kitchen tools. It's a wise investment that will serve you well for years to come.
